title: One More Night
description: Trevor is one of the most eligible bachelors in the state, but he doesn't want to be tied down in any relationship. He is focused on running his business, making money, and becoming a better man than his father. He enjoys sex, but for him, that's all it is, a couple of hours of fun between him and another man he will probably never see again.Prince has survived on his own for years, working the streets and moving from one city to another. He does what he must to survive, no matter what. Sex is a business and one that he has learned to do well.Prince is the last person Trevor thought he'd be spending his night with, but when the two meet, there is an explosive desire that draws the two of them together.There is nothing wrong with sharing a night of pleasure, unless one night turns into two.
author: E.M. Leya
